title: Octology
description: The manuscript describes a new scientific discipline called Octology, which should unify morphogenetic linguistics and neurobiology to investigate the development of the words, cognition and behavior.http://enzymes.at/octology/octology.htm http://enzymes.at/download/octology.pdf (pdf A4 format)http://enzymes.at/download/ope.pdf (pdf A5 format)https://www.epubli.de/shop/buch/97367 (softcover paperbook)
author: Andrej Poleev
